scripts.asbuild:debug: asc assembly/stylus/entrypoint.ts --target debug && wasm2wat build/debug.wasm > build/debug.wat
scripts.asbuild:release: asc assembly/stylus/entrypoint.ts --target release && wasm2wat build/release.wasm > build/release.wat
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
